verses.verse: And the ark <WH727> of the LORD <WH3068> was in the country <WH7704> of the Philistines <WH6430> seven <WH7651> months <WH2320>.

And the Philistines <WH6430> called <WH7121> for the priests <WH3548> and the diviners <WH7080>, saying <WH559>, What shall we do <WH6213> to the ark <WH727> of the LORD <WH3068>? tell <WH3045> us wherewith we shall send <WH7971> it to his place <WH4725>.

And they said <WH559>, If ye send away <WH7971> the ark <WH727> of the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>, send <WH7971> it not empty <WH7387>; but in any wise <WH7725> return <WH7725> him a trespass offering <WH817>: then ye shall be healed <WH7495>, and it shall be known <WH3045> to you why his hand <WH3027> is not removed <WH5493> from you.

Then said <WH559> they, What shall be the trespass offering <WH817> which we shall return <WH7725> to him? They answered <WH559>, Five <WH2568> golden <WH2091> emerods <WH2914> <WH6076>, and five <WH2568> golden <WH2091> mice <WH5909>, according to the number <WH4557> of the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430>: for one <WH259> plague <WH4046> was on you all, and on your lords <WH5633>. you: Heb. them

Wherefore ye shall make <WH6213> images <WH6754> of your emerods <WH2914> <WH6076>, and images <WH6754> of your mice <WH5909> that mar <WH7843> the land <WH776>; and ye shall give <WH5414> glory <WH3519> unto the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>: peradventure he will lighten <WH7043> his hand <WH3027> from off you, and from off your gods <WH430>, and from off your land <WH776>.

Wherefore then do ye harden <WH3513> your hearts <WH3824>, as the Egyptians <WH4714> and Pharaoh <WH6547> hardened <WH3513> their hearts <WH3820>? when he had wrought wonderfully <WH5953> among them, did they not let the people go <WH7971>, and they departed <WH3212>? wonderfully: or, reproachfully the people: Heb. them

Now therefore make <WH6213> a <WH259> new <WH2319> cart <WH5699>, and take <WH3947> two <WH8147> milch <WH5763> kine <WH6510>, on which there hath come <WH5927> no yoke <WH5923>, and tie <WH631> the kine <WH6510> to the cart <WH5699>, and bring <WH7725> their calves <WH1121> home <WH1004> from them <WH310>:

And take <WH3947> the ark <WH727> of the LORD <WH3068>, and lay <WH5414> it upon the cart <WH5699>; and put <WH7760> the jewels <WH3627> of gold <WH2091>, which ye return <WH7725> him for a trespass offering <WH817>, in a coffer <WH712> by the side <WH6654> thereof; and send it away <WH7971>, that it may go <WH1980>.

And see <WH7200>, if it goeth up <WH5927> by the way <WH1870> of his own coast <WH1366> to Bethshemesh <WH1053>, then he hath done <WH6213> us this great <WH1419> evil <WH7451>: but if not, then we shall know <WH3045> that it is not his hand <WH3027> that smote <WH5060> us: it was a chance <WH4745> that happened to us <WH1961>. he: or, it

And the men <WH582> did so <WH6213>; and took <WH3947> two <WH8147> milch <WH5763> kine <WH6510>, and tied <WH631> them to the cart <WH5699>, and shut up <WH3607> their calves <WH1121> at home <WH1004>:
And they laid <WH7760> the ark <WH727> of the LORD <WH3068> upon the cart <WH5699>, and the coffer <WH712> with the mice <WH5909> of gold <WH2091> and the images <WH6754> of their emerods <WH2914>.

And the kine <WH6510> took the straight <WH3474> way <WH1870> to the way <WH1870> of Bethshemesh <WH1053>, and went along <WH1980> the highway <WH4546> <WH259>, lowing <WH1600> as they went <WH1980>, and turned not aside <WH5493> to the right hand <WH3225> or to the left <WH8040>; and the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430> went <WH1980> after <WH310> them unto the border <WH1366> of Bethshemesh <WH1053>.

And they of Bethshemesh <WH1053> were reaping <WH7114> their wheat <WH2406> harvest <WH7105> in the valley <WH6010>: and they lifted up <WH5375> their eyes <WH5869>, and saw <WH7200> the ark <WH727>, and rejoiced <WH8055> to see <WH7200> it.

And the cart <WH5699> came <WH935> into the field <WH7704> of Joshua <WH3091>, a Bethshemite <WH1030>, and stood <WH5975> there, where there was a great <WH1419> stone <WH68>: and they clave <WH1234> the wood <WH6086> of the cart <WH5699>, and offered <WH5927> the kine <WH6510> a burnt offering <WH5930> unto the LORD <WH3068>.

And the Levites <WH3881> took down <WH3381> the ark <WH727> of the LORD <WH3068>, and the coffer <WH712> that was with it, wherein the jewels <WH3627> of gold <WH2091> were, and put <WH7760> them on the great <WH1419> stone <WH68>: and the men <WH582> of Bethshemesh <WH1053> offered <WH5927> burnt offerings <WH5930> and sacrificed <WH2076> sacrifices <WH2077> the same day <WH3117> unto the LORD <WH3068>.
And when the five <WH2568> lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430> had seen <WH7200> it, they returned <WH7725> to Ekron <WH6138> the same day <WH3117>.

And these are the golden <WH2091> emerods <WH2914> which the Philistines <WH6430> returned <WH7725> for a trespass offering <WH817> unto the LORD <WH3068>; for Ashdod <WH795> one <WH259>, for Gaza <WH5804> one <WH259>, for Askelon <WH831> one <WH259>, for Gath <WH1661> one <WH259>, for Ekron <WH6138> one <WH259>;

And the golden <WH2091> mice <WH5909>, according to the number <WH4557> of all the cities <WH5892> of the Philistines <WH6430> belonging to the five <WH2568> lords <WH5633>, both of fenced <WH4013> cities <WH5892>, and of country <WH6521> villages <WH3724>, even unto the great <WH1419> stone of Abel <WH59>, whereon they set down <WH3240> the ark <WH727> of the LORD <WH3068>: which stone remaineth unto this day <WH3117> in the field <WH7704> of Joshua <WH3091>, the Bethshemite <WH1030>. great: or, great stone

And he smote <WH5221> the men <WH376> of Bethshemesh <WH1053>, because they had looked <WH7200> into the ark <WH727> of the LORD <WH3068>, even he smote <WH5221> of the people <WH5971> fifty <WH2572> thousand <WH505> and threescore and ten <WH7657> men <WH582>: and the people <WH5971> lamented <WH56>, because the LORD <WH3068> had smitten <WH5221> many of the people <WH5971> with a great <WH1419> slaughter <WH4347>.

And the men <WH582> of Bethshemesh <WH1053> said <WH559>, Who is able <WH3201> to stand <WH5975> before <WH6440> this holy <WH6918> LORD <WH3068> God <WH430>? and to whom shall he go up <WH5927> from us?

And they sent <WH7971> messengers <WH4397> to the inhabitants <WH3427> of Kirjathjearim <WH7157>, saying <WH559>, The Philistines <WH6430> have brought again <WH7725> the ark <WH727> of the LORD <WH3068>; come ye down <WH3381>, and fetch it up <WH5927> to you.
